content: As the Metaverse continues to change the current technology landscape, companies and brands may be rethinking their current and future Customer Experience strategies to adapt to the rise of the new, virtual world.Immersive technologies such as virtual and augmented reality have the power to amaze, amuse and inform us.The application of augmented reality (AR) and virtual reality (VR) for customer experience (CX) is on the rise in many industries, research suggests that the AR and VR market is expected to grow by $125bn over the next four years.One of the largest benefits of online advertising is that it is much more affordable compared with other traditional adverting methods. Even on a shoestring budget, business owners can access a fairly wide audience and stretch their marketing dollars further.Meta O Land is a broad term.
